alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lipscomb, northern Roberts and southern Ochiltree Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Wolf Creek Park, or 23 miles southeast of Spearman, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Creek Park and Farnsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
